Key Match Events: Kyle Hendricks threw 7 1/3 scoreless innings in the Cubs' 3-0 win against the Reds.
Pre-Game Insights: This could be Kyle Hendricks' last game with the Cubs as he is set to test free agency for the first time.
Post-Match Reflections: Hendricks expressed feeling lucky and happy after the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Aerosmith's 'Sweet Emotion' played as Hendricks was relieved from the game, a nod to the song often associated with his entrances.
